00085         public void MainPage_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
00086         {
00087                         if (this.parameters.ContainsKey("userName"))
00088             {
00089                                 // User is logged, username provided in asp params
00090                 username = this.parameters["userName"];
00091             }
00092 
00093             trips = new ObservableCollection<Trip>();
00094             TripGrid.ItemsSource = trips;
00095             TripGrid.SelectionChanged += new SelectionChangedEventHandler(TripGrid_SelectionChanged);
00096 
00097             DescriptionStack.MouseEnter += new MouseEventHandler(DescriptionStack_MouseEnter);
00098             DescriptionStack.MouseLeave += new MouseEventHandler(DescriptionStack_MouseLeave);
00099 
00100             TripDescriptionTextEditButton.Click += new RoutedEventHandler(TripDescriptionTextEditButton_Click);
00101             TripDescriptionTextSaveButton.Click += new RoutedEventHandler(TripDescriptionTextSaveButton_Click);
00102 
00103                         // Create WCF endpoint
00104             EndpointAddress endpoint = new EndpointAddress(remoteAddress);
00105                         // Create Silverlight WCF proxy
00106             tripiWcfService = new TripServiceClient(new BasicHttpBinding(), endpoint);
00107             tripiWcfService.GetPositionNodesForTripCompleted += new EventHandler<GetPositionNodesForTripCompletedEventArgs>(tripiWcfService_GetPositionNodesForTripCompleted);
00108             tripiWcfService.GetAllTripsCompleted += new EventHandler<GetAllTripsCompletedEventArgs>(tripiWcfService_GetAllTripsCompleted);
00109             tripiWcfService.GetAllTripsAsync();
00110         }

00117         void TripDescriptionTextSaveButton_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
00118         {
00119             descriptionEditing = false;
00120             TripDescriptionTextEditor.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00121             TripDescriptionText.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00122             DescriptionStack_MouseEnter(null, null);
00123 
00124             tripiWcfService.UpdateTripDescriptionCompleted += new EventHandler<System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>(tripiWcfService_UpdateTripDescriptionCompleted);
00125             trip.TripDescription = TripDescriptionTextEditor.Text;
00126             tripiWcfService.UpdateTripDescriptionAsync(trip.ID, trip.TripDescription);
00127         }
00128 
00134         void TripDescriptionTextEditButton_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
00135         {
00136             descriptionEditing = true;
00137             TripDescriptionTextEditor.Text = TripDescriptionText.Text;
00138             TripDescriptionTextEditor.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00139             TripDescriptionText.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00140             DescriptionStack_MouseEnter(null, null);
00141         }
00142 
00148         void tripiWcfService_UpdateTripDescriptionCompleted(object sender, System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs e)
00149         {
00150             TripDescriptionText.Text = trip.TripDescription;
00151         }

00159         void DescriptionStack_MouseLeave(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)
00160         {
00161             TripDescriptionTextEditButton.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00162             TripDescriptionTextSaveButton.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00163         }

00172         void DescriptionStack_MouseEnter(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)
00173         {
00174             if (trip == null || username == null)
00175             {
00176                 return;
00177             }
00178             if (trip.Username.Equals(username))
00179             {
00180                                 // User is owner of the trip
00181                 if (!descriptionEditing)
00182                 {
00183                                         // Trip description is in view state
00184                     TripDescriptionTextSaveButton.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00185                     TripDescriptionTextEditButton.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00186                 }
00187                 else
00188                 {
00189                                         // Trip description is in edit state
00190                     TripDescriptionTextSaveButton.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00191                     TripDescriptionTextEditButton.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00192                 }
00193             }
00194         }
00195 
00202         void TripGrid_SelectionChanged(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)
00203         {
00204             DataGrid dg = (DataGrid)sender;
00205             trip = (Trip)dg.SelectedItem;
00206             TripDescriptionText.Text = trip.TripDescription;
00207             tripiWcfService.GetPositionNodesForTripAsync(trip.ID);
00208 
00209 
00210             descriptionEditing = false;
00211             TripDescriptionTextEditor.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00212             TripDescriptionText.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00213             DescriptionStack_MouseLeave(null, null);
00214         }

00221         void tripiWcfService_GetAllTripsCompleted(object sender, GetAllTripsCompletedEventArgs e)
00222         {
00223             foreach (Trip trip in e.Result)
00224             {
00225                 trips.Add(trip);
00226             }
00227             TripGrid.ColumnWidth = DataGridLength.Auto;
00228         }

00235         void tripiWcfService_GetPositionNodesForTripCompleted(object sender, GetPositionNodesForTripCompletedEventArgs e)
00236         {
00237             PositionNode[] positionArray = (PositionNode[])e.Result;
00238             List<PositionNode> positionList = positionArray.ToList();
00239             drawPolyline(positionList);
00240         }
00241 
00246         private void drawPolyline(List<PositionNode> list)
00247         {
00248                         Infobox.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00249             MapLayer.Children.Clear();
00250                         PinLayer.Children.Clear();
00251             if (list.Count == 0)
00252             {
00253                 MapStatusText.Text = "Trip does not have any points";
00254                 MapStatus.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00255                 return;
00256             }
00257             MapStatus.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00258 
00259             MapPolyline mapPolyline = new MapPolyline();
00260             //mapPolyline.Fill = new SolidColorBrush(Colors.Red);
00261             mapPolyline.Stroke = new SolidColorBrush(Colors.Yellow);
00262             mapPolyline.StrokeThickness = 8;
00263             mapPolyline.Opacity = 0.7;
00264             mapPolyline.Locations = new LocationCollection();
00265 
00266 
00267             pushpinsDescriptions.Clear();
00268                         IList<Location> locations = new List<Location>();
00269             foreach (PositionNode positionNode in list)
00270             {
00271                                 // Add point to polyline
00272                 Location location = new Location(positionNode.Latitude, positionNode.Longitude);
00273                                 locations.Add(location);
00274                 mapPolyline.Locations.Add(location);
00275 
00276 
00277                 if (positionNode.Description != null && !positionNode.Description.Equals(""))
00278                 {
00279                                         // Point is Interesting point and has description
00280                                         // Create pushpin with TextBlock containing its description
00281                                         Pushpin pushpin = new Pushpin();
00282                     pushpin.Location = location;
00283                                         pushpin.Name = positionNode.OrdinalNumber.ToString();
00284                                         pushpinsDescriptions.Add(pushpin.Name, positionNode.Description);
00285                                         pushpin.MouseLeftButtonUp += new MouseButtonEventHandler(pushpin_MouseLeftButtonUp);
00286                     PinLayer.Children.Add(pushpin);
00287                 }
00288             }
00289             MapLayer.Children.Add(mapPolyline);
00290 
00291                         // Zoom and set center to view whole polyline with 50px margin around
00292                         SetBestMapView(locations, Map, 50);
00293         }
00294 
00300                 void pushpin_MouseLeftButtonUp(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)
00301                 {
00302                         Pushpin pushpin = (Pushpin) sender;
00303                         InfoboxDescription.Text = pushpinsDescriptions[pushpin.Name];
00304                         Infobox.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
00305                 }

00312         private void CloseInfobox_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
00313         {
00314             Infobox.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
00315         }

00323                 public void SetBestMapView(IList<Location> locations, Map map, int buffer)
00324                 {
00325                         Location center = new Location();
00326                         double zoomLevel = 0;
00327 
00328                         double maxLat = -85;
00329                         double minLat = 85;
00330                         double maxLon = -180;
00331                         double minLon = 180;
00332 
00333                         //calculate bounding rectangle
00334                         for (int i = 0; i < locations.Count; i++)
00335                         {
00336                                 if (locations[i].Latitude > maxLat)
00337                                 {
00338                                         maxLat = locations[i].Latitude;
00339                                 }
00340 
00341                                 if (locations[i].Latitude < minLat)
00342                                 {
00343                                         minLat = locations[i].Latitude;
00344                                 }
00345 
00346                                 if (locations[i].Longitude > maxLon)
00347                                 {
00348                                         maxLon = locations[i].Longitude;
00349                                 }
00350 
00351                                 if (locations[i].Longitude < minLon)
00352                                 {
00353                                         minLon = locations[i].Longitude;
00354                                 }
00355                         }
00356 
00357                         center.Latitude = (maxLat + minLat) / 2;
00358                         center.Longitude = (maxLon + minLon) / 2;
00359 
00360                         double zoom1 = 0, zoom2 = 0;
00361 
00362                         //Determine the best zoom level based on the map scale and bounding coordinate information
00363                         if (maxLon != minLon && maxLat != minLat)
00364                         {
00365                                 //best zoom level based on map width
00366                                 zoom1 = Math.Log(360.0 / 256.0 * (map.ActualWidth - 2 * buffer) / (maxLon - minLon)) / Math.Log(2);
00367                                 //best zoom level based on map height
00368                                 zoom2 = Math.Log(180.0 / 256.0 * (map.ActualHeight - 2 * buffer) / (maxLat - minLat)) / Math.Log(2);
00369                         }
00370 
00371                         //use the most zoomed out of the two zoom levels
00372                         zoomLevel = (zoom1 < zoom2) ? zoom1 : zoom2;
00373 
00374                         map.Center = center;
00375                         map.ZoomLevel = zoomLevel;                      
00376                 }
00377     }
00378 }
